name: Oracle's Inn (Louie Chapman)
description:
Welcome to Oracle's Inn ! Catch glimpses into the futures of your customers , and prepare for them live-saving potions in advance !

Made in 72hrs for MiniJam 112: Chron

Controls:
  • Arrow keys or ESDF: Move
  • X or Z: Submit
  • Enter: Pause


Welcome to my potion shoppe ! I'm glad to have you here . However , I can sense dark waters in your future . I know just the ingredients...

In Oracle's Inn you take the role of alchemist/doctor/oracle/bundle of joy and happen to be just the person your customers need . Catch glimpses into the futures of your customers , and prepare for them live-saving potions in advance !

@0xFFB3 | @yolwoocle_
